Ablative Coating.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Heal for {scale=100|100} for each enemy hit with Poppy Bomb.

Accelerant.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduces the time it takes for Grumpy Bomb to explode by 40%.

Air Blast.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Increase your air control by {scale=10|10}% until you land after launching yourself with Poppy Bomb.

Backdraft.card_desc: [Detonate] Reduce the Cooldown of Poppy Bomb by {scale=0.1|0.1}s for each Sticky Bomb you Detonate.

Bomb Shelter.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the damage you deal to yourself with Sticky Bombs by {scale=20|20}%.

Chain Reaction.card_desc: [Detonate] Hitting with more than one Sticky Bomb on a use of Detonate increases the damage of each explosion after the first by 30% of its base damage, up to 150%.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduce the Cooldown of Grumpy Bomb by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Doomsday.card_desc: [Grump Bomb] Heal for {scale=50|50} after using Grumpy Bomb.

Explosive Entrance.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Heal for {scale=50|50} after using Poppy Bomb.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduce the Cooldown of Poppy Bomb by {scale=1|1}s for each enemy hit by Grumpy Bomb.

Jolt.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Increase the effect of Poppy Bomb’s Knockback by {scale=15|15}% and cause Poppy Bomb to explode on contact with any surface.

King's Court.card_desc: [Detonate] Heal for {scale=15|15} for each Sticky Bomb you Detonate.

Mad Bomber.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=7|7}% for 2s after using Grumpy Bomb.

Royal Decree.card_desc: [Detonate] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 3s after using Detonate.

Royal Subjects.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase the radius of Sticky Bombs' explosions by 20%.

Shock and Awe.card_desc: [Detonate] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 4s after getting a Killing Blow with Detonate.

Uncontrolled.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting a Killing Blow.

Ablativer Belag.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Für jeden mit Puffbombe getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Angst und Schrecken.card_desc: [Zünder] Todesstöße mit Zünder erhöhen dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Brandbeschleuniger.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Verkürzt die Zeit bis zur Explosion der Grummelbombe um 40%.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Grummelbombe um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Explosiver Auftritt.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Nach Verwendung von Puffbombe wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Puffbombe für jeden mit Grummelbombe getroffenen Gegner um {scale=1|1}s.

Flammenexplosion.card_desc: [Zünder] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Puffbombe für jede gezündete Haftbombe um {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Hof des K\u00f6nigs.card_desc: [Zünder] Für jede gezündete Haftbombe wirst du {scale=15|15} LP geheilt.

Irrer Bomber.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Nach Verwendung von Grummelbombe erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=7|7}%.

Kettenreaktion.card_desc: [Zünder] Triffst du einen Gegner mit mehreren Bomben, fügt ihm jede Bombe nach der ersten 30% mehr Schaden zu, bis zu einem Maximum von 150%.

K\u00f6nigliche Untertanen.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht den Explosionsradius der Haftbomben um 20%.

K\u00f6niglicher Erlass.card_desc: [Zünder] Nach Verwendung von Zünder erhöht sich dein Nachladetempo 3s lang um {scale=5|5}%.

Luftschlag.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Erhöht deine Luftkontrolle nach dem Abschuss mit Puffbombe bis du landest um {scale=10|10}%.

Neuer K\u00f6nigsmantel.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Schock.card_desc: [Puffbombe] Die Puffbombe explodiert bei Kontakt mit einer Oberfläche und verursacht um {scale=15|15}% erhöhten Rückstoß.

Weltuntergang.card_desc: [Grummelbombe] Nach Verwendung von Grummelbombe wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Abri anti-bombe.card_desc: [Arme] Les Bombes collantes vous infligent {scale=20|20}% de dégâts en moins.

Artificier f\u00eal\u00e9.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Bombe grognon augmente votre vitesse de {scale=7|7}% pendant 2s.

Choc et effroi.card_desc: [Explosion] Chaque exécution avec Explosion augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 4s.

Compte \u00e0 rebours.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Bombe grognon se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Contre-explosion.card_desc: [Explosion] Chaque Bombe collante qui explose réduit le temps de recharge de Bombe paf de {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Couche ablative.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf vous rend {scale=100|100} PV par ennemi atteint.

Cour royale.card_desc: [Explosion] Chaque Bombe collante qui explose vous rend {scale=15|15} PV.

D\u00e9cret royal.card_desc: [Explosion] Explosion augmente votre vitesse de rechargement de {scale=5|5}% pendant 3s.

Entr\u00e9e explosive.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf vous rend {scale=50|50} PV.

Explosion a\u00e9rienne.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Quand vous êtes propulsé par Bombe paf, votre contrôle aérien augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Incontr\u00f4lable.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Jugement dernier.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Bombe grognon vous rend {scale=50|50} PV.

Pouss\u00e9e.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Le délai avant l'explosion de la Bombe grognon diminue de 40%.

R\u00e9action en cha\u00eene.card_desc: [Explosion] Les Bombes collantes dont l'explosion atteint la même cible infligent 30% de dégâts supplémentaires après la première, jusqu'à un maximum de 150%.

R\u00e9percussion.card_desc: [Bombe grognon] Le temps de recharge de Bombe paf diminue de {scale=1|1}s par ennemi touché avec Bombe grognon.

Soubresaut.card_desc: [Bombe paf] Bombe paf explose à l'impact et son recul est {scale=15|15}% plus important.

Sujets de la Couronne.card_desc: [Arme] Le rayon d'explosion des Bombes collantes augmente de 20%.

\u5012\u8ba1\u65f6.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 减少狂暴炸弹的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u52a0\u56fa\u5916\u58f3.card_desc: [粘性炸弹] 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

\u53cd\u6d41.card_desc: [引爆] 每引爆一颗粘性炸弹，罂粟炸弹的冷却时间就会降低{scale=0.1|0.1}秒

\u56fd\u738b\u7684\u65b0\u8863.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u5ba1\u5224\u65e5.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 使用狂爆炸弹时回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u6025\u901f\u51b2\u649e.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 罂粟炸弹对敌人造成的击退效果提高{scale=15|15}%，并且在接触任何目标或表面时都将直接引爆

\u6050\u6016\u7edf\u6cbb.card_desc: [引爆] 使用引爆击败敌人或助攻时将提升你的移动速度{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u610f\u5916\u7206\u70b8.card_desc: [护甲] 你的移动速度无法被降至{scale=60|10}%以下

\u70e7\u707c\u5916\u58f3.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 罂粟炸弹命中一个敌人，自身回复{scale=100|100}点生命值

\u7206\u70b8\u767b\u573a.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 激活罂粟炸弹时回复{scale=50|50}点生命

\u7206\u70b8\u9632\u62a4.card_desc: [粘性炸弹] 粘性炸弹对自己造成的伤害降低{scale=20|20}%

\u738b\u5ead.card_desc: [引爆] 每个被引爆的粘性炸弹都将治疗你{scale=15|15}生命值

\u75af\u72c2\u6295\u5f39.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 使用狂爆炸弹后移动速度提高{scale=7|7}%，持续2秒

\u7687\u5bb6\u6cd5\u4ee4.card_desc: [引爆] 引爆炸弹后的3秒内增加{scale=5|5}%装填速度

\u7687\u5bb6\u8bd5\u9a8c\u54c1.card_desc: [武器] 粘性炸弹的爆炸范围提高30%

\u7a7a\u88ad.card_desc: [罂粟炸弹] 在你被罂粟炸弹击飞期间，空中操控能力提升{scale=10|10}%

\u8f90\u5c04.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 狂爆炸弹每命中一个敌人，罂粟炸弹的冷却时间就会降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u8fde\u9501\u53cd\u5e94.card_desc: [引爆] 当多个炸弹命中同一名敌人时，后续炸弹造成的伤害提高30%

\u9ad8\u7206\u89e6\u5a92.card_desc: [狂暴炸弹] 狂暴炸弹的引爆速度加快40%

Ablative Coating.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Increase the health of Poppy Bomb by {50}

Accelerant.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Increase the self Knockback of Poppy Bomb by 10%.

Air Blast.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] You have {15}% more air control while airborne after hitting yourself with Poppy Bomb.

Backdraft.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Lower the Cooldown of Poppy Bomb by 1s if you only hit yourself with it.

Bomb Shelter.card_desc: [Sticky Bomb] Reduce the self damage you receive from Sticky Bombs by {25}%.

Countdown.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Reduce the cooldown of Grumpy Bomb by {1}s.

Doomsday.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Grumpy Bomb deals 100% more damage to shields.

Fallout.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] When Grumpy Bomb explodes he spawns an HP drop that heals for 100.

Flare.card_desc: [Weapon] Detonating Sticky Bombs reveals affected enemies for 2s.

Jolt.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Poppy Bomb explodes on contact and has a {10}% increased knockback against enemies.

King's Court.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Heal for 200 health over 2s for each enemy hit by Grumpy Bomb, max {1} target.

Reinforced Casing.card_desc: [Sticky Bomb] Increase the health of Sticky Bomb by {25}.

Royal Army.card_desc: [Weapon] Eliminations increase your reload speed by {10}% for 5s.

Royal Decree.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] Hitting yourself with Poppy Bomb heals you for {100} Health over 4s.

Shell Shock.card_desc: [Grumpy Bomb] Grumpy Bomb slows targets hit by 10% for 4s.

Shock and Awe.card_desc: [Poppy Bomb] After Poppy Bomb explodes, gain {15}% Movement Speed for 3s.

Acelerante.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Se reduce el tiempo que tarda Bomba iracunda en explotar un 40%.

Bombardero loco.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=7|7}% durante 2s tras usar Bomba iracunda.

Capa aislante.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Bomba adormidera.

Capa real nueva.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Conmoci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] El efecto de repeler de Bomba adormidera aumenta un {scale=15|15}% y haces que Bomba adormidera explote al contactar con cualquier superficie.

Corte de reyes.card_desc: [Detonación] Te curas {scale=15|15} PS por cada Bomba pegajosa detonada.

Cubierta reforzada.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu cantidad de munición máxima aumenta en {scale=1|1}.

Cuenta regresiva.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Se reduce la recarga de Bomba iracunda en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Decreto real.card_desc: [Detonación] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=5|5}% durante 3s tras usar Detonar.

Descontrol.card_desc: [Armadura] Se reducen tus recargas activas un {scale=10|10}% tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Dominio r\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Detonación] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 4s tras asestar un golpe de gracia con Detonación.

Entrada explosiva.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS tras activar Bomba adormidera.

Hurac\u00e1n.card_desc: [Bomba adormidera] Tu control en el aire aumenta un {scale=10|10}% hasta aterrizar después de propulsarte con Bomba adormidera.

Juicio final.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS tras usar Bomba iracunda.

Reacci\u00f3n en cadena.card_desc: [Detonación] Si alcanzas con más de una Bomba pegajosa al usar una Detonación, el daño de cada explosión después de la primera aumenta un 30% de su daño básico, hasta un máximo del 150%.

Refugio.card_desc: [Bomba iracunda] Se reduce la recarga de Bomba adormidera en {scale=1|1} s por cada enemigo que alcances con Bomba iracunda.

Refugio antibombas.card_desc: [Arma] Se reduce el daño que recibes de tus propias Bombas pegajosas un {scale=20|20}%.

Sujetos reales.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta el radio de las explosiones de Bomba pegajosa un 20%.

Volatilidad.card_desc: [Detonación] Se reduce la recarga de Bomba adormidera en {scale=0.1|0.1}s por cada Bomba pegajosa que detonas.

Abrigo Antibomba.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz em {scale=20|20}% o dano autoinfligido causado pelas suas Bombas Adesivas.

Acelerador.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Reduz em 40% o tempo que leva para a Bomba Ranzinza explodir.

Bombardeiro Louco.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=7|7}% por 2s após usar a Bomba Ranzinza.

Capa Refor\u00e7ada.card_desc: Aumenta em {scale=1|1} a sua munição máxima.

Choque.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] Aumenta em {scale=15|15}% a repulsão da Bomba Caseira, e ela explode ao atingir qualquer superfície.

Contagem.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Reduz o intervalo da Bomba Ranzinza em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Corte do Rei.card_desc: [Detonador] Você se cura em {scale=15|15} por cada Bomba Adesiva que detonar.

Decreto Real.card_desc: [Detonador] Recarrega a arma {scale=5|5}% mais rápido por 3s após usar o Detonador.

Descontrolado.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% os intervalos ativos após dar o tiro fatal em um inimigo.

Dom\u00ednio R\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Detonador] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 4s após dar o golpe fatal com o Detonador em um inimigo.

Entrada Explosiva.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} após usar a Bomba Caseira.

Igni\u00e7\u00e3o Explosiva.card_desc: [Detonador] Reduz o intervalo da Bomba Caseira em {scale=0.1|0.1}s para cada Bomba Adesiva que você detonar.

Jato de Ar.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] Aumenta o seu controle aéreo em {scale=10|10}% até você aterrissar após se propelir usando a Bomba Caseira.

Ju\u00edzo Final.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida após usar a Bomba Ranzinza.

Rea\u00e7\u00e3o em Cadeia.card_desc: [Detonador] Atingir o mesmo alvo com mais de uma Bomba Adesiva num único uso do Detonador, aumenta em 30% o dano de cada bomba subsequente após a primeira, até um máximo de 150% a mais de dano.

Ref\u00fagio.card_desc: [Bomba Ranzinza] Reduz o intervalo da Bomba Caseira em {scale=1|1}s a cada inimigo atingido pela Bomba Ranzinza.

Revestimento Pesado.card_desc: [Bomba Caseira] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida a cada inimigo atingido pela Bomba Caseira.

Roupa Nova do Rei.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

S\u00faditos Reais.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a área de explosão das Bombas Caseiras em 20%.

\u0410\u0431\u043b\u044f\u0446\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Хлопушка] За каждого пораженного Хлопушкой врага вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u0411\u043e\u043c\u0431\u043e\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Урон, который вы получаете от собственных Бомб-липучек, понижается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0434\u0443\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Хлопушка улучшает управление в воздухе на {scale=10|10}%, пока вы не приземлитесь.

\u0413\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043a\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Активация Хлопушки исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041a\u043e\u0440\u043e\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Взрыв] После использования Взрыва скорость перезарядки повышается на {scale=5|5}% на 3 с.

\u041d\u0435\u0443\u043f\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Текущая перезарядка ваших способностей сокращается на {scale=10|10}% после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u041d\u043e\u0432\u0430\u044f \u043c\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Перезарядка Угрюмой бомбы сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.
[Взрыв] Каждый взрыв Бомбы-липучки сокращает перезарядку Хлопушки на {scale=0.1|0.1} с.

\u041e\u0442\u0431\u0440\u0430\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Каждое попадание по врагу Угрюмой бомбой сокращает перезарядку Хлопушки на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0421\u0443\u0434 \u043a\u043e\u0440\u0.card_desc: [Взрыв] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=15|15} ед. за каждый взрыв Бомбы-липучки.

\u0421\u0443\u0434\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] После использования Угрюмой бомбы вы исцеляетесь на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0422\u0440\u044f\u0441\u043a\u0430.card_desc: [Хлопушка] Эффект отбрасывания Хлопушки усиливается на {scale=15|15}%, а сама Хлопушка взрывается при столкновении с любой поверхностью.

\u0423\u0441\u0438\u043b\u0435\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=1|1} ед.

\u0423\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0440\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Сокращает время до взрыва Угрюмой бомбы на 40%.

\u0426\u0435\u043f\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Взрыв] Если вы поражаете врагов взрывом более чем одной бомбы-липучки, то урон от каждого взрыва после первого повышается на 30% от базового, до 150%.

\u0427\u043e\u043a\u043d\u0443\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Угрюмая бомба] Использование Угрюмой бомбы повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=7|7}% на 2 с.

\u0428\u043e\u043a \u0438 \u0442\u0440\u.card_desc: [Взрыв] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с. после нанесения смертельного удара Взрывом.

Ablatywne okrycie.card_desc: [Makówka] Trafienie wroga Makówką przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ.

Dekret kr\u00f3la.card_desc: [Detonacja] Użycie Detonacji skraca na 3 s czas przeładowania o {scale=5|5}%.

Drgni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Makówka] Zwiększa efekt odrzucenia Makówki o {scale=15|15}% i powoduje, że Makówka wybucha w momencie kontaktu z dowolną powierzchnią.

Kr\u00f3lewscy poddani.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa promień eksplozji Lepkiej bomby o 20%.

Kr\u00f3lewski dw\u00f3r.card_desc: [Detonacja] Przywraca {scale=15|15} PZ za każdy wybuch Lepkiej bomby.

Nowy p\u0142aszcz kr\u00f3la.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Odliczanie.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Skraca czas odnowienia Zrzędliwej bomby o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Opad radioaktywny.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Trafienie wroga Zrzędliwą bombą skraca czas odnowienia Makówki o {scale=1|1} s.

Podmuch.card_desc: [Detonacja] Skraca czas odnowienia Makówki o {scale=0.1|0.1} s za każdą zdetonowaną Lepką bombę.

Powietrzny podmuch.card_desc: [Makówka] Zwiększa kontrolę lotu o {scale=10|10}%, dopóki nie wylądujesz po wystrzeleniu się przy pomocy Makówki.

Poza kontrol\u0105.card_desc: [Pancerz] Skraca aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}% po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

Przyspieszacz.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Zrzędliwa bomba wybucha po czasie o 40% krótszym.

Reakcja \u0142a\u0144cuchowa.card_desc: [Detonacja] Trafienie więcej niż jedną Lepką bombą przy użyciu Detonacji zadaje dodatkowe obrażenia od każdego wybuchu po pierwszym w wysokości 30% obrażeń bazowych, do maks. 150%.

S\u0105d ostateczny.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Użycie Zrzędliwej bomby przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ.

Schron przeciwbombowy.card_desc: [Broń] Zmniejsza obrażenia zadawane sobie Lekką bombą o {scale=20|20}%.

Szalony bomber.card_desc: [Zrzędliwa bomba] Użycie Zrzędliwej bomby zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=7|7}% na 2 s.

Szok i przera\u017cenie.card_desc: [Detonacja] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 5 s po zadaniu Detonacją Zabójczego ciosu.

A\u015f\u0131nm\u0131\u015f Kaplama.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Bomba S\u0131\u011f\u0131na\u011f\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Yapışkan Bombalar ile kendine verdiğin hasarı %{scale=20|20} azalt.

\u00c7\u0131lg\u0131n Bombac\u0131.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba'yı kullandıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=7|7} artır.

Gerisay\u0131m.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Hava Patlamas\u0131.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba ile yükseldikten sonra inene kadar hava kontrolünü %{scale=10|10} artır.

H\u0131zland\u0131r\u0131c\u0131.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba'nın patlama süresini %40 azalt.

K\u0131yamet G\u00fcn\u00fc.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba kullandıktan sonra {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Kontrols\u00fcz.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Kral\u0131n Mahkemesi.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlatılan her Yapışkan Bomba için {scale=15|15} Can iyileş.

Kraliyet Ferman\u0131.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlat'ı kullandıktan sonra Yeniden Doldurma hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} artır.

N\u00fckleer Kal\u0131nt\u0131.card_desc: [Aksi Bomba] Aksi Bomba ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra Kızıl Bomba'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azalt.

Patlay\u0131c\u0131 Giri\u015f.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba'yı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Sarsma.card_desc: [Kızıl Bomba] Kızıl Bomba'nın Geri İtme etkisini %{scale=15|15} artır ve Kızıl Bomba herhangi bir yüzeyle temasta patlasın.

\u015eok ve Deh\u015fet.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlat ile bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 4sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Yang\u0131n.card_desc: [Patlat] Patlattığın her Yapışkan Bomba için Kızıl Bomba'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.1|0.1}sn azalt.

Zincirleme Tepki.card_desc: [Patlat] Bir Patlat kullanımında birden fazla Yapışkan Bomba ile vurmak, ilkinden sonraki her patlamanın hasarını taban hasarın %30'u kadar artırır. Bu en fazla %150 olabilir.
